headline: Why Northern Trust Stock Zoomed 11% Higher This Week
summary: A newspaper report stated a suitor might be interested in effectively acquiring the bank.  Very often, when a publicly traded company is the focus of takeover interest, investors are attracted to its stock.  On Sunday, The Wall Street Journal broke the news that Bank of New York Mellon (NYSE: BK) indicated to Northern Trust that it desired a merger with the smaller banking group.

headline: BNY’s Chief Sounds Ready for a Deal. Is Northern Trust the One?
summary: Robin Vince talks M&A amid reports that his firm approached Northern. Why banks for the superrich are tough acquisition targets.
